name: DECEIT1 (Demo Version)
description:
Check "Help" menu in the bedroom.

Any feedback is desired!

Introduction

Play as Eris, or Elisabeth... we're not sure. You have been abducted along with a girl who is supposed to be your protegee. At the enemy king's castle, after days of captivity, your superiors have arrived for a negotiation. See what happens after.

The game was meant to be an otome where you can date Selios, Deous, and Minos (on compulsory order). I have finished most of the script, but the story became too long to be made into one game. Now I plan to release Selios's path first as a full game. This demo version contains the first 10 days of this path.

You can walk around the castle. There will be an event every day.

Your choices during the events affect your 'progress'.

After you have triggered the event of the day, you can go to sleep in your bedroom to proceed.

There are minor events around the map. In some cases, they affect your 'progress' too.  Currently available minor events: Provisions (a shady acquaintance); A Night of Illusions; dreams (unfinished); random dialogues in many locations.

The game ends on Day 31 (the demo version includes days 1-10). The progress determines your ending. There are two endings for Selios's path.

As days go on and you accumulate progress during the game, random dialogues will change.

Credits: See 'About' menu. I'll write a complete acknowledgement in the full version. :P
